alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange Mills, or near Hastings, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings, East Palatka, Bostwick, Federal Point, Orange Mills, Picolata, Spuds and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns
